data.name: Gradient
desc: Describes a gradient between two colors.
Many aspects of the gradient are undefined, like the algorithm and color space to use to interpolate between the colors and what "intensity" means.

items.name: Angle
lines: angle of the gradient in 1/10 degree.

items.name: Border
lines: per cent of the total width where just the start color is used.

items.name: EndColor
lines: specifies the color at the end point of the gradient.

items.name: EndIntensity
lines: specifies the intensity at the end point of the gradient.

items.name: StartColor
lines: specifies the color at the start point of the gradient.

items.name: StartIntensity
lines: Specifies the intensity at the start point of the gradient.

items.name: StepCount
lines: Specifies the number of steps of change color.

items.name: Style
lines: specifies the style of the gradient.

items.name: XOffset
lines: Specifies the X-coordinate, where the gradient begins.
This is effectively the center of the RADIAL, ELLIPTICAL, SQUARE and RECT style gradients.

items.name: YOffset
lines: Specifies the Y-coordinate, where the gradient begins.
